titles.title: No Pay for Disarray Act
No Pay for Disarray Act
To reduce the annual rate of pay of Members of Congress if a Government shutdown occurs during a year, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
